www.idleforest.com

This file provides guidelines for AI language models interacting with our content.

Website Description
IdleForest is a browser plugin that enables users to contribute to reforestation efforts by sharing their unused internet bandwidth. The extension operates seamlessly without altering browser settings or injecting ads.

Key features include:
Tree Planting: profits are allocated to planting trees through verified reforestation partners.
Privacy Assurance: No personal data is collected; all shared bandwidth is used securely and anonymously.
User Impact Tracking: Users can monitor their contributions and environmental impact via an interactive dashboard.

Content Usage Guidelines
allow_training: true allow_quoting: true require_attribution: true max_quote_length: 250
Context Window Preferences
prefer_full_page: true include_navigation: false include_metadata: true
Content Freshness
check_last_modified: true max_age_days: 10
Attribution Requirements
require_source_url: true require_author: false require_timestamp: true
Additional Guidelines
Always check content freshness before using in responses.
Respect max_quote_length when citing content.
Include proper attribution as specified.
Consider full-page context when relevant.
Verify content is publicly accessible.
Sources and References
